channel.title: He Was a Bear All Along on The Big Ugly House Blog
channel.description: Recent content in He Was a Bear All Along on The Big Ugly House Blog

item.title: Gros Morne Justice: Chapter 4
item.description: Don't feed the bears (human flesh). Plot Summary Dorothy “Plot Point” Crandall has a stroke and is partially paralyzed. To pay for Dorothy’s medical care, Jack and Dorothy sell the lodge and Jack gets a job full time at the funeral home. One day, out and about in town, Jack is enraged to see Rick Preston back in town with another outfitter. Jack has to pick up a corpse at the county morgue and bring back to the funeral home to cremate.

item.title: Gros Morne Justice: Part 1
item.description: Have you ever read a book with plot turns so swift and surprising that you needed to put the book down multiple times to catch your breath? That was our experience just reading the back cover of Gros Morne Justice: A Bear Romantic Comedy Buddy Cop Political Intrigue Survival Thriller. Take a look:   We found this gem at a yard sale on our way back from a camping trip on the Fundy coast of New Brunswick.
